text.p: These are the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Saddam Hussein tells a group of Iraqi writers that no one alone can express the greatness of the "Mother of Battles" (Iraq's term for the 1991 Gulf War over Kuwait).
- Saddam, his wife and eldest son receive well-wishers.
- Iraq calls for the release of $50 million of its money frozen in banks in several Arab countries.
- Sudanese official warns Kuwait against listening to U.S. lies.
- Albright is of a Jewish origin.
- Commentary attacks Kuwaiti stands vis-a-vis Arab countries and Iraq.
- Culture and information minister receives Moroccan ambassador.
- Industry and minerals minister receives Romanian industrial delegation.
